patterns_discovered: Using separate utility functions for different types of haptic feedback
Modular approach to adding interaction feedback
Keeping haptic triggers in a centralized utils/haptics module
gotchas_discovered: Need to ensure haptic feedback doesn't interfere with user interaction
Potential performance overhead of frequent haptic triggers

approach_outcome.description: Added haptic feedback when user selects a region color from the palette

recommendations: Consider making haptic feedback configurable in user settings
Test different intensities of haptic feedback for various interactions
Document the purpose and usage of different haptic utility functions
